comments:
When using the JSP Editor, text entry can change from left-to-right to become
left-to-right.  NullPointer exceptions are reported in dialog boxes.  Restarting
eclipse removes the problem.

I haven't figured out what triggers this yet.
Here is the stack trace from my .log.
